Practical 1:
Q) Using R execute the basic commands, list and frame.
Code:
x=c(22,34,23,12,76,45,44,37,98,89,78)
>
>mean(x)
[1] 50.72727
>length(x)
[1] 11
>mode(x)
[1] "numeric"
>median(x)
[1] 44
>sort(x)
 [1] 12 22 23 34 37 44 45 76 78 89 98
>sort(x,decreasing=T)
 [1] 98 89 78 76 45 44 37 34 23 22 12
>min(x)
[1] 12
>max(x)
[1] 98
>range(x)
[1] 12 98
>sqrt(x)
 [1] 4.690416 5.830952 4.795832 3.464102 8.717798 6.708204 6.633250 6.082763
 [9] 9.899495 9.433981 8.831761
>log(x)
 [1] 3.091042 3.526361 3.135494 2.484907 4.330733 3.806662 3.784190 3.610918
 [9] 4.584967 4.488636 4.356709
> log10(x)
 [1] 1.342423 1.531479 1.361728 1.079181 1.880814 1.653213 1.643453 1.568202
 [9] 1.991226 1.949390 1.892095
>exp(x)
 [1] 3.584913e+09 5.834617e+14 9.744803e+09 1.627548e+05 1.014800e+33
 [6] 3.493427e+19 1.285160e+19 1.171914e+16 3.637971e+42 4.489613e+38
[11] 7.498417e+33
>summary(x)
   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
  12.00   28.50   44.00   50.73   77.00   98.00 
>abs(x)
 [1] 22 34 23 12 76 45 44 37 98 89 78
